TITLE: Installing and Running WAHA Docker Container
DESCRIPTION: Commands to download and run the WAHA docker container that exposes the WhatsApp HTTP API. Sets up webhook URL and events configuration.
SOURCE: https://github.com/devlikeapro/waha/blob/core/examples/python/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
# Download the image
docker pull devlikeapro/waha
# Run the docker container
docker run -it --rm --network=host -e WHATSAPP_HOOK_URL=http://localhost:5000/bot -e "WHATSAPP_HOOK_EVENTS=*" --name waha devlikeapro/waha
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running the WAHA Docker Container
DESCRIPTION: Command to run the WAHA Docker container in interactive mode, exposing port 3000 and assigning a name to the container.
SOURCE: https://github.com/devlikeapro/waha/blob/core/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
docker run -it --rm -p 3000:3000/tcp --name waha devlikeapro/waha

# It prints logs and the last line must be
# WhatsApp HTTP API is running on: http://[::1]:3000
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Pulling the WAHA Docker Image
DESCRIPTION: Command to pull the public Docker image for WAHA from Docker Hub repository.
SOURCE: https://github.com/devlikeapro/waha/blob/core/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
docker pull devlikeapro/waha
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Sending a Text Message JSON Payload
DESCRIPTION: Example JSON payload for sending a text message to a specific WhatsApp contact using their phone number formatted as a chat ID.
SOURCE: https://github.com/devlikeapro/waha/blob/core/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "chatId": "12132132130@c.us",
  "text": "Hi there!",
  "session": "default"
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Sending a Text Message Using cURL
DESCRIPTION: Bash script showing how to send a text message using cURL by setting the phone number as an environment variable and making a POST request to the API.
SOURCE: https://github.com/devlikeapro/waha/blob/core/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
# Phone without +
export PHONE=12132132130
curl -d "{\"chatId\": \"${PHONE}@c.us\", \"text\": \"Hello from WhatsApp HTTP API\" }" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X POST http://localhost:3000/api/sendText
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Sending Test Message Payload
DESCRIPTION: JSON payload example for sending a test message through the WAHA API. Demonstrates the required format for sending text messages.
SOURCE: https://github.com/devlikeapro/waha/blob/core/examples/python/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "chatId": "12132132130@c.us",
  "text": "Hi there!",
  "session": "default"
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating a New WhatsApp Session JSON Payload
DESCRIPTION: Example JSON payload for starting a new WhatsApp session with the name 'default'.
SOURCE: https://github.com/devlikeapro/waha/blob/core/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "name": "default"
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting Up WhatsApp Echo Bot
DESCRIPTION: Commands to clone the repository, install dependencies, and run the Echo Bot that replies back with the same message it receives.
SOURCE: https://github.com/devlikeapro/waha/blob/core/examples/python/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
# Clone the git repository with example
git clone https://github.com/devlikeapro/waha.git
# Open python example folder
cd waha/examples/python
# Install requirements
python -mpip install -r requirements.txt
# Run the bot
FLASK_APP=whatsapp_echo_bot.py flask run
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting Up WhatsApp Download Files Bot
DESCRIPTION: Commands to set up and run the Download Files Bot that can receive and save files sent through WhatsApp messages.
SOURCE: https://github.com/devlikeapro/waha/blob/core/examples/python/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
# Clone the git repository with example
git clone https://github.com/devlikeapro/waha.git
# Open python example folder
cd waha/examples/python
# Install requirements
python -mpip install -r requirements.txt
# Run the bot
FLASK_APP=whatsapp_download_files_bot.py flask run
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing WAHA for ARM Architecture
DESCRIPTION: Special installation commands for ARM-based systems like Apple Silicon/M1, including pulling the ARM-specific image and tagging it for compatibility.
SOURCE: https://github.com/devlikeapro/waha/blob/core/examples/python/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
# Download the image
docker pull devlikeapro/waha:arm
# Rename it, so you can use devlikeapro/waha image in other place
docker tag devlikeapro/waha:arm devlikeapro/waha
# Run the docker container
docker run -it --rm --network=host -e WHATSAPP_HOOK_URL=http://localhost:5000/bot -e "WHATSAPP_HOOK_EVENTS=*" --name waha devlikeapro/waha
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Authenticating and Pulling WAHA Plus Docker Image
DESCRIPTION: Commands to authenticate with Docker Hub, pull the premium WAHA Plus image, and then log out for security.
SOURCE: https://github.com/devlikeapro/waha/blob/core/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
docker login -u devlikeapro -p {KEY}
docker pull devlikeapro/waha-plus
docker logout
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing and Running WAHA Plus Version
DESCRIPTION: Commands to install and run the premium WAHA Plus version, which includes additional features like file downloading capabilities.
SOURCE: https://github.com/devlikeapro/waha/blob/core/examples/python/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
# Download the image
docker pull devlikeapro/waha-plus
# Run the docker container
docker run -it --rm --network=host -e WHATSAPP_HOOK_URL=http://localhost:5000/bot -e "WHATSAPP_HOOK_EVENTS=*" --name waha devlikeapro/waha-plus
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting Up WAHA Development Environment
DESCRIPTION: Commands to set up the WAHA development environment, including installing dependencies, compiling proto files, and starting the application.
SOURCE: https://github.com/devlikeapro/waha/blob/core/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
# Install dependencies
yarn install
# Fetch and compile proto files
yarn gows:proto
# Run
yarn start
# open http://localhost:3000
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Defining Python Dependencies with Version Constraints
DESCRIPTION: Specifies the required Python packages for the Waha project with version constraints. Uses the tilde (~) operator to allow compatible minor version updates while pinning MarkupSafe to a specific version.
SOURCE: https://github.com/devlikeapro/waha/blob/core/examples/python/requirements.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: plaintext
CODE:
```
flask~=1.0
requests~=2.0
markupsafe==2.0.1
```
